xmlText.p: First Period_1, Montreal, Froese 2 (Carr, Benn), 8:52. 2, Tampa Bay, Point 25 (Killorn), 12:07.
Second Period_3, Tampa Bay, Kucherov 33 (Hedman, Johnson), 7:32 (pp). 4, Montreal, Morrow 5 (Pacioretty, Hudon), 8:50. 5, Montreal, Pacioretty 17 (Drouin, Petry), 16:29 (pp).
